author: TheAntiRoxy
title: Piece number off, but overall an adorable set
review: An adorable little set for the money. I love it. However the piece count miffed me a little considering about 7 of the pieces are just "coin" bricks that go inside the trunk. I would've liked to maybe have some stuff inside that looked like luggage.

author: United_Bricks
title: Review of set 30110 Trolley
review:
This set came out as a promotion with the sun newspaper in the uk, You bought the sun newspaper for 30p then you  went to WHsmiths or toyrus and picked up your lego. The comes with 22 pieces and is the worst in the promotion in my opinion, the lego comes with one minifigure harry potter, a owl and a trolley. On to the review.

The minifigure

The harry potter is good because you can only find this kind of harry potter in one other set and that is 4841 Hogwarts Express and unless you want to pay loads of money for this minifigure this is the set to get.

Harry potters hair is the normal harry potter black hair. His face is double sided and is skin colored, One side of his face he's smiling and the other side of his face he's not smiling. His torso is a dark blue open jacket and his legs are normal and are dark bluish grey colour. He also come with a brown lightsaber stick which is meant to be a wand.


The trolley and the owl

The trolley is a simple build which can move about. Ontop of the trolley you can put the brown box which has loads of golden studs. Finally the owl is white and is harry potters owl. Its a new desighn and has printing on it.

The Packaging and Overall

The packaging is a polybag and has the harry potter logo on it.

Overall its ok, and I would get it just for the minifigure.
